content: For those of you using the cql-execution JavaScript library, we've just released a new version that addresses over 40 issues. Check out the release notes: https://github.com/cqframework/cql-execution/releases/tag/v2.2.0

And we have corresponding releases of related libraries:

  • cql-exec-fhir 2.0.0: dependency updates and updated models (breaking change) -- Release Notes
  • cql-exec-vsac 1.2.1: dependency updates -- Release Notes
  • cql-exec-examples: dependency updates, UMLS API key support, and minor example CQL tweaks -- Repository
